result.title: Plan for the Exploitation and Dissemination of Results
result.description: The PEDR summarises concrete dissemination activities during and after the project to guarantee sustainability of interventions at GEII level, to initiate a gender equality discourse at national or local level as well as to initiate an international and academic debate of TARGET results.
